align-items: center;\n          gap: 0.5rem;\n          padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem;\n          background: transparent;\n          border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);\n          border-radius: 8px;\n          color: var(--default-color);\n          font-size: 0.9rem;\n          font-weight: 500;\n          cursor: pointer;\n          transition: all 0.3s ease;\n          text-decoration: none;\n        }\n        \n        .back-arrow-btn:hover {\n          border-color: var(--accent-color);\n          background-color: rgba(227, 161, 39, 0.1);\n          color: var(--accent-color);\n          transform: translateX(-2px);\n        }\n        \n        .back-arrow-btn i {\n          font-size: 1.1rem;\n        }\n        \n        .embed-btn {\n          display: inline-flex;\n          align-items: center;\n          gap: 0.5rem;\n          padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem;\n          background: rgba(227, 161, 39, 0.1);\n          border: 2px solid var(--accent-color);\n          border-radius: 8px;\n          color: var(--accent-color);\n          font-size: 0.9rem;\n          font-weight: 500;\n          cursor: pointer;\n          transition: all 0.3s ease;\n          text-decoration: none;\n        }\n        \n        .embed-btn:hover {\n          background-color: var(--accent-color);\n          color: var(--contrast-color);\n          transform: translateY(-2px);\n          box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(227, 161, 39, 0.3);\n        }\n        \n        .embed-btn i {\n          font-size: 1.1rem;\n        }\n        \n \n        \n        .game-card {\n          background: var(--surface-color);\n          border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);\n          border-radius: 15px;\n          box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);\n          padding: 2rem;\n          margin-bottom: 2rem;\n          transform: translateY(0);\n          transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;\n        }\n        \n        .game-card:hover {\n          transform: translateY(-5px);\n          box-shadow: 0 15px 35px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);\n        }\n        \n     \n        \n        h2 {\n          color: var(--heading-color);\n          font-family: var(--heading-font);\n          margin-top: 0;\n          font-weight: 600;\n        }\n        \n        h3 {\n          color: var(--heading-color);\n          font-family: var(--heading-font);\n          font-weight: 600;\n        }\n        \n        p {\n          color: var(--default-color);\n          line-height: 1.6;\n        }\n        \n        .progress-container {\n          width: 100%;\n          height: 10px;\n          background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);\n          border-radius: 5px;\n          margin-bottom: 2rem;\n        }\n        \n        .progress-bar {\n          height: 100%;\n          border-radius: 5px;\n          background: var(--accent-color);\n          width: 0%;\n          transition: width 0.5s ease;\n        }\n        \n        .question-content {\n          display: grid;\n          grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;\n          gap: 2rem;\n          margin-bottom: 1.5rem;\n          align-items: start;\n        }\n        \n        .question-image {\n          display: flex;\n          justify-content: center;\n          align-items: flex-start;\n        }\n        \n        .question-img {\n          width: 100%;\n          // max-width: 400px;\n          height: auto;\n          border-radius: 12px;\n          box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);\n          transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;\n        }\n        \n        .question-img:hover {\n          transform: translateY(-5px);\n          box-shadow: 0 12px 35px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);\n        }\n        \n        .question-text-options {\n          display: flex;\n          flex-direction: column;\n        }\n        \n        .question {\n          margin-bottom: 1.5rem;\n          font-weight: 500;\n          font-size: 1.1rem;\n          color: var(--heading-color);\n        }\n        \n        .options {\n          display: grid;\n          grid-template-columns: 1fr;\n          gap: 1rem;\n        }\n        \n        .option {\n          padding: 1rem;\n          border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);\n          border-radius: 8px;\n          cursor: pointer;\n          transition: all 0.3s ease;\n          background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);\n          color: var(--default-color);\n        }\n        \n        .option:hover {\n          border-color: var(--accent-color);\n          background-color: rgba(227, 161, 39, 0.1);\n          transform: translateY(-2px);\n        }\n        \n        .option.selected {\n          border-color: var(--accent-color);\n          background-color: rgba(227, 161, 39, 0.15);\n          color: var(--contrast-color);\n        }\n        \n        .option.correct {\n          border-color: var(--success);\n          background-color: rgba(5, 150, 82, 0.15);\n        }\n        \n        .option.incorrect {\n          border-color: var(--danger);\n          background-color: rgba(223, 21, 41, 0.15);\n        }\n        \n        .btn {\n          display: inline-block;\n          padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;\n          border: none;\n          border-radius: 50px;\n          font-weight: 600;\n          cursor: pointer;\n          transition: all 0.3s ease;\n          font-size: 0.9rem;\n          letter-spacing: 1px;\n          text-transform: uppercase;\n        }\n        \n        .btn-primary {\n          background-color: var(--accent-color);\n          color: var(--contrast-color);\n          border: 1px solid var(--accent-color);\n        }\n        \n        .btn-primary:hover {\n          transform: translateY(-2px);\n          background-color: color-mix(in srgb, var(--accent-color), black 10%);\n          box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(227, 161, 39, 0.4);\n        }\n        \n        .btn-secondary {\n          background-color: transparent;\n          color: var(--accent-color);\n          border: 2px solid var(--accent-color);\n        }\n        \n        .btn-secondary:hover {\n          background-color: var(--accent-color);\n          color: var(--contrast-color);\n        }\n        \n        .hidden {\n          display: none;\n        }\n        \n        .result-section {\n          text-align: center;\n        }\n        \n        .score {\n          font-size: 3rem;\n          font-weight: 700;\n          color: var(--accent-color);\n          margin: 1rem 0;\n          font-family: var(--heading-font);\n        }\n        \n        .feedback {\n          margin-bottom: 2rem;\n          font-size: 1.1rem;\n          color: var(--default-color);\n          padding: 1rem;\n          background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);\n          border-radius: 8px;\n          border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);\n        }\n        \n        .lead-form {\n          display: grid;\n          grid-template-columns: 1fr;\n          gap: 1rem;\n          margin-top: 2rem;\n          text-align: left;\n        }\n        \n        .form-group {\n          margin-bottom: 1rem;\n        }\n        \n        label {\n          display: block;\n          margin-bottom: 0.5rem;\n          font-weight: 500;\n          color: var(--heading-color);\n        }\n        \n        input, select {\n          width: 100%;\n          padding: 0.8rem;\n          border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);\n          border-radius: 8px;\n          font-size: 1rem;\n          transition: border-color 0.3s ease;\n          background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);\n          color: var(--default-color);\n          box-sizing: border-box;\n        }\n        \n        input:focus, select:focus {\n          outline: none;\n          border-color: var(--accent-color);\n          background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);\n        }\n        \n        input::placeholder {\n          color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4);\n        }\n        \n        .checkbox-group {\n          display: flex;\n          align-items: center;\n          margin-top: 1rem;\n        }\n        \n        .checkbox-group input {\n          width: auto;\n          margin-right: 0.5rem;\n        }\n        \n        .checkbox-group label {\n          margin-bottom: 0;\n          color: var(--default-color);\n        }\n        \n        .feature-badge {\n          display: inline-block;\n          padding: 0.5rem 1rem;\n          background-color: rgba(227, 161, 39, 0.1);\n          color: var(--accent-color);\n          border: 1px solid rgba(227, 161, 39, 0.3);\n          border-radius: 20px;\n          margin: 0.5rem;\n          font-size: 0.9rem;\n          font-weight: 600;\n        }\n        \n        .confirmation {\n          text-align: center;\n          padding: 2rem;\n        }\n        \n        .confirmation-icon {\n          font-size: 4rem;\n          color: var(--success);\n          margin-bottom: 1rem;\n        }\n        \n        a {\n          color: var(--accent-color);\n          text-decoration: none;\n          transition: 0.3s;\n        }\n        \n        a:hover {\n          color: color-mix(in srgb, var(--accent-color), transparent 25%);\n        }\n        \n 1fr;\n            gap: 1.5rem;\n          }\n          \n          .question-image {\n            order: 1;\n          }\n          \n          .question-text-options {\n            order: 2;\n
